clique >= 1.2.0, < 2

sphinx >= 1.2.2, < 2
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2

lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2
pytest >= 2.3.5, < 3

sphinx >= 1.2.2, < 2
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2

[tests]
